subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The winner of the Preakness Stakes is a prohibitive 6-5 morning-line favorite in the $1.25 million Haskell Invitational at Monmouth on Sunday.
snippet: The winner of the Preakness Stakes is a prohibitive 6-5 morning-line favorite in the $1.25 million Haskell Invitational at Monmouth on Sunday.
